title: Correspondence - HSE.ie
cleaned_text: This section contains all correspondence sent to General Practitioners and other Health Professionals. 2023 2022 2021 2020 2019 2018 2016 2015 2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 2008 - [UD Letter September 2008](/eng/health/immunisation/hcpinfo/correspondence/ud08.pdf) Letter that was sent with delivery schedules to all surgeries that receive vaccines from United Drug on behalf of the HSE Immunisation Programme. 2007 2006 - [Tetanus ](/eng/health/immunisation/hcpinfo/correspondence/tetanus07.pdf)National Immunisation Advisory Committee Recommendations for Tetanus. December 2006 - [Guidelines for Pneumococcal vaccination](/eng/health/immunisation/hcpinfo/correspondence/pneumo07.pdf) pneumococcal vaccination information for individuals at increased risk of invasive pneumococcal disease. This page was updated on 5 September 2023
